text: Stephen Mukatuka (born 19 December 1998) is a Zimbabwean footballer who plays as a defender for Mbabane Swallows and the Zimbabwe national football team. ==Career== On 31 January 2019, Mukatuka joined Mbabane Swallows in Eswatini.Caps United captain Makatuka quits, newsday.co.zw, 31 January 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:CAPS United players Category:AmaZulu F.C. players Category:Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League players Category:South African Premier Division players Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Zimbabwe international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Masvingo
title: Stephen Mukatuka
